http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/fien-print/better-call-saul-season-3-finale-explained-1015384

We know you're not ending the series here. We know the show does well for AMC. What is the hold-up on the official renewal for a fourth season?

Gilligan: Honestly, it's obviously not a secret that Zack Van Amburg and Jamie Erlicht left Sony TV and there's just a little bit of reorganizing going at Sony, but the ship, there's still folks at the tiller and and it's just a matter of … Who the f--- knows? (Laughs.) It's gonna be fine. The timing was a bit unfortunate in that there's a little bit of stuff up in the air over at Sony, but it'll all get worked out. A couple of good guys left Sony, but there's a lot of good people still at Sony and it'll all get worked out. We're going forward with the certainty that there is gonna be more and it's just a matter of logistics as to when, exactly, it gets going. We're not worried. I say that having absolutely been worried in the past. I'm worried at all right now. We're gonna forward. There will be a season four. The only question is when will it go on air.

原來因為Sony果邊所以遲遲未講

S3開始冇耐出左EP10 title果陣已經有人估chuck會燒死
中撚左

Kim is going to develop an opioid addiction. She has an addictive personality evidenced through her tendency as a workaholic and she goes overboard with things evidenced by her getting ten movies at blockbuster. She choose the "good stuff" over the ibuprofen, clearly foreshadowing. Also, it would make sense given the time period, the early 2000s were a big time for prescription drug addictions because doctors were handing out painkillers like candy

越睇越似層層 如果係真就真係sad到爆
關drug事仲可以扣返brba

Kim is going to develop an opioid addiction. She has an addictive personality evidenced through her tendency as a workaholic and she goes overboard with things evidenced by her getting ten movies at blockbuster. She choose the "good stuff" over the ibuprofen, clearly foreshadowing. Also, it would make sense given the time period, the early 2000s were a big time for prescription drug addictions because doctors were handing out painkillers like candy

It appears that Better Call Saul has been quietly renewed for a 4th season by AMC. Per Production Weekly, production on the 4th season is set to begin in November.
http://www.spoilertv.com/2017/06/better-call-saul-renewed-for-4th-season.html

如果11月拍，預S4會4月中至5月頭左右播

嘩！岩岩睇完！今集真係好精彩，由其係中段Chuck慢慢fall apart果段真係feel到佢有幾焦慮，由佢熄總制，到拎住d light bulb，再到打爆牆果種愈黎愈絕望既感覺

不過其實雖然jimmy冇心，
但佢真係親手殺左佢自己大佬！
（好有breaking bad最後walter害死hank果種feel）

今集我睇果陣就係度諗，點解Chuck個病明明都慢慢好既，點解忽然會突然惡化到咁。

原因其實唔係因為Jimmy當住咁多人面踢爆佢尼個心理病，踢爆完佢，反而令Chuck有動力逼自己去求醫去面對返個病，然後終於搵到個方法可以做返正常人，可以做返執業律師（一路以黎都睇得出佢係幾專重法律同幾咁想做返執業律師），點知Jimmy上去Insurance company度爆佢大獲，尼個行為純粹係為左傷害Chuck，令Howard焗佢退休，而唔係為自己d咩利益。尼個breakpoint最後導致Chuck冇左面對自己個病既動力，最終就係一發不可收拾既心理反彈同病情惡化

Jimmy一定會怪自己 不過Chuck果句you never matter all that much to me真係係我個腦響左好耐
